description: This file defines API routes related to payment processing within a FastAPI application. It includes endpoints for initiating a payment session and handling payment webhooks, utilizing services for payments and authentication, and interacting with database models for purchases and books.

classes.name: PaymentInitRequest
classes.description: Pydantic model representing the request payload for initializing a payment session, containing the book ID and optional currency.

classes.name: PaymentInitResponse
classes.description: Pydantic model representing the response for payment session creation, including provider name and session data.

methods.name: _get_db()
methods.description: Utility function to provide a database session, ensuring proper closing after use.

methods.name: _auth_required(authorization: Optional[str] = None)
methods.description: Dependency that verifies the presence and validity of an authorization token, raising an HTTP 401 error if invalid.

methods.name: create_payment_session(req: PaymentInitRequest, auth=Depends(_auth_required), db: Session = Depends(_get_db))
methods.description: Endpoint to initialize a new payment session, fetching the book, calculating amount, and invoking the payment provider.

methods.name: payment_webhook(request: Request, db: Session = Depends(_get_db))
methods.description: Endpoint to process payment provider webhooks, verify the event, and record completed purchases if applicable.

ctags.name: book_id
ctags.pattern: /^    book_id: str = Field(..., description="Book ID to purchase")$/

ctags.name: currency
ctags.pattern: /^    currency: Optional[str] = Field(None, description="Currency code, defaults to backend settin/

ctags.name: payment_webhook
ctags.pattern: /^async def payment_webhook(request: Request, db: Session = Depends(_get_db)):$/
